requirements.shall: All serviceable joints shall be metal gasket face-seal (/FS, VCR-compatible); no PTFE/elastomer in wetted helium service.
Each /FS remake shall use a new metal gasket with batch trace and tamper-seal scan.
Panel-side interfaces shall be female and module-side interfaces male unless formally approved deviation is logged.
Pneumatic/solenoid pilots controlling manual isolation valves shall fail open so loss of air does not obstruct nominal manual flow.
Leak acceptance shall meet Table 6 values under ambient and standby conditions using EN 13185 / ISO 20485 helium MS testing.
DBB plus eductor purge shall achieve residual air ≤0.05% prior to breaking any /FS joint.
QINFRA.S and QRB.S shall be protected at 1.3 bar(a) with PSV capacity ≥200 g/s He @ 300 K discharging to WCS.LP recovery.
Provide bursting disc and PSV populations/setpoints: BD 60 QCELL + 5 QPLANT; PSV 180 QCELL + 30 QPLANT with setpoints per policy.
Implement tamper-evident ties across /FS nuts with scan-based remake counting integrated to CIS.
